Article: Engineers often focus on the speeds and feeds of the components they use in their designs, but finding the right source is just as critical to the success of the product. Choosing one supplier over another based on its resiliency profile will make a measurable difference to risk associated to a particular design. The Resilinc R Score is working to help streamline the process of making those determinations. The ranking methodology highlights organizations that are leading the charge in managing risk and bringing their supply chain organization to the highest levels of resiliency.
